# USVisualizations

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of USVisualizations is to provide a set of publicly available data to be visualized through a shiny interface using the leaflet js library.

## Installation

To install this package, use the `remotes` package, and the following command:


``` r
remotes::install_github("roBertus31/USVizualizations")
```
